https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/t2bt1GedaCLvCRGva6kO0ykAsBR.jpg When an ignored little boy bonds with Bigfoot and discovers the human-like ape is in danger, he has to find the courage to stand up to those bigger than him to save the legendary creature and set him free. Bigfoot and the Burtons
